[i][b]Disney's A Christmas Carol, a multi-sensory thrill ride re-envisioned by Academy AwardÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â®-winning filmmaker Robert Zemeckis, captures the fantastical essence of the classic Dickens tale using groundbreaking, performance-capture technology. 

Ebenezer Scrooge (Jim Carrey) begins Christmas with his usual miserly contempt, barking at his faithful clerk (Gary Oldman) and his cheery nephew (Colin Firth). But when the ghosts of Christmas past, present and yet to come take him on an eye-opening journey revealing truths old Scrooge is reluctant to face, he must open his heart to undo years of ill will before it's too late.
